name: Gold Egg
description:
# Description

A golden egg. What lays inside is a mystery but it looks like it will hatch soon.

You can craft a golden egg at the Goblin Farmer in the game.

### Contributor

Sunflower Land is a community game built by a hundreds of developers and artists across the globe.
Come join us on [Github](https://github.com/sunflower-land/sunflower-land)
